00050 
00051 ostream& operator<<(ostream& output,  generic_plugin& p)
00052 {
00053         generic_server *fwork = (generic_server *) p.pinstance;
00054     vector<string>::iterator itr;
00055         output.clear();
00056         output << "(PLUGIN_TYPE: " <<  setw(12) << setfill(' ') << setiosflags(ios::left) <<  p.plugin_type << " ";
00057         output << " PLUGIN_ID: "   <<  setw(12) << setfill(' ') << setiosflags(ios::left) << p.plugin_name << " ";
00058         output << " IP: "        <<  setw(12) << p.local_ip_address;
00059         if(p.tls_enabled)
00060                 output << " TLS_PORT: "  << p.port << ")";
00061         else
00062                 output << " RAW_PORT: "  << p.port << ")";
00063     for(itr = p.v_plugin_aliases.begin(); itr != p.v_plugin_aliases.end(); ++itr)
00064         {
00065                 output << endl;
00066                 output << fwork->get_cur_time();
00067                 output << "(PLUGIN_TYPE: " <<  setw(12) << setfill(' ') << setiosflags(ios::left) <<  p.plugin_type << " ";
00068                 output << " ALIAS PLUGIN_ID: "   <<  setw(12) << setfill(' ') << setiosflags(ios::left) << (*itr) << " ";
00069                 output << " IP: "        <<  setw(12) << p.local_ip_address;
00070                 if(p.tls_enabled)
00071                         output << " TLS_PORT: "  << p.port << ")";
00072                 else
00073                         output << " RAW_PORT: "  << p.port << ")";
00074         }
00075     return output; 
00076 }

00078 
00079 generic_plugin &generic_plugin::operator=(const generic_plugin &rhs)
00080 {
00081         if(this != &rhs)
00082         {
00083                 plugin_type = rhs.plugin_type;
00084                 plugin_number = rhs.plugin_number;
00085                 plugin_name = rhs.plugin_name;
00086                 client_socket = rhs.client_socket;
00087                 server_socket = rhs.server_socket;
00088                 plugin_conf_file = rhs.plugin_conf_file;
00089                 networking = rhs.networking;
00090                 verbose_level = rhs.verbose_level;
00091                 tls_enabled = rhs.tls_enabled;
00092                 thread_id = rhs.thread_id;
00093                 validate_plugin = rhs.validate_plugin;
00094                 port = rhs.port;
00095                 pinstance = rhs.pinstance;
00096                 local_ip_address = rhs.local_ip_address;
00097                 v_plugin_aliases = rhs.v_plugin_aliases;
00098         }
00099         return(*this);
00100 }

00179 
00180 bool generic_plugin::find_plugin_alias(string alias_name)
00181 {
00182     vector<string>::iterator itr;
00183     for(itr = v_plugin_aliases.begin(); itr != v_plugin_aliases.end(); ++itr)
00184                 if((*itr) == alias_name)
00185                         return(true);
00186     return(false);
00187 }
00188 /*********************************************************************************************/
00189 
00190 int generic_plugin::aliases_count()
00191 {
00192         return(v_plugin_aliases.size());
00193 }
00194 /*********************************************************************************************/
00195 
00196 string generic_plugin::pop_alias()
00197 {
00198         string alias_name;
00199 
00200         alias_name = v_plugin_aliases.front();
00201         v_plugin_aliases.erase(v_plugin_aliases.begin());
00202         return(alias_name);
00203 }

00278 
00279 generic_plugin::generic_plugin(void)
00280 {
00281         verbose_level = 2;
00282         networking = 1;
00283         tls_enabled = 0;
00284         local_ip_address = NULL;
00285         validate_plugin = true;
00286         plugin_name = "";
00287         plugin_conf_file = "";
00288         plugin_number = "";
00289         plugin_type = "";
00290         client_socket = 0;
00291         server_socket = 0;
00292         tls_enabled = 0;
00293         pinstance = 0;
00294         thread_id = 0;
00295 }

00306         local_ip_address = NULL;
00307         validate_plugin = true;

00312 {

00314         plugin_type = plugin_name;
00315         plugin_name = plugin_id;
00316         networking = 1;
00317         tls_enabled = 0;
00318         verbose_level = 2;
00319         local_ip_address = NULL;
00320         validate_plugin = true;
00321 }
00322 /*********************************************************************************************/
00323 
00324 SOCKET generic_plugin::initialize_socket(string port)
00325 {
00326         SOCKET ListenSocket, on;
00327         struct addrinfo *result = NULL;
00328         struct sockaddr_in local_address;
00329         struct sockaddr_in *sa;
00330         struct addrinfo hints;
00331         ostringstream os;
00332         int iResult;
00333         generic_server *fwork = (generic_server *) pinstance;
00334 
00335         memset(&local_address,0,sizeof(local_address));
00336     memset(&hints, 0,sizeof(hints));
00337     hints.ai_family = AF_INET;
00338     hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00339     hints.ai_protocol = IPPROTO_TCP;
00340     hints.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
00341     iResult = getaddrinfo(NULL, port.c_str(), &hints, &result);
00342     if (iResult != 0)
00343     {
00344         os.str("");
00345         os.clear();
00346         os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID:MAIN getaddrinfo failed.";
00347         fwork->log(LOG_LOW,verbose_level,os.str());
00348         }
00349     // Create a SOCKET for one device/plugin
00350     ListenSocket = socket(result->ai_family, result->ai_socktype, result->ai_protocol);
00351     if (ListenSocket == INVALID_SOCKET)
00352     {
00353         os.str("");
00354         os.clear();
00355         os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket creation failed.";
00356         fwork->log(LOG_LOW,verbose_level,os.str());
00357         freeaddrinfo(result);
00358         return 0;
00359     }
00360         on = 1;
00361 #ifdef WINDOWS
00362         setsockopt(ListenSocket,SOL_SOCKET, SO_EXCLUSIVEADDRUSE,(char *) &on, sizeof (on));
00363 #endif
00364         setsockopt(ListenSocket,SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, (char *)&on, sizeof(on));
00365         if(!networking)
00366         {
00367                 local_address.sin_family = AF_INET;
00368                 local_address.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr("127.0.0.1");
00369                 local_address.sin_port = htons(atoi(port.c_str()));
00370         iResult = bind(ListenSocket, (sockaddr *) &local_address, (int)result->ai_addrlen);
00371                 sa = (struct sockaddr_in *) result->ai_addr;
00372                 local_ip_address = inet_ntoa(local_address.sin_addr);
00373         }
00374         else
00375         {
00376                 iResult = bind(ListenSocket, result->ai_addr, (int)result->ai_addrlen);
00377                 sa = (struct sockaddr_in *) result->ai_addr;
00378                 local_ip_address = inet_ntoa(sa->sin_addr);
00379         }
00380     if (iResult == SOCKET_ERROR)
00381     {
00382         os.str("");
00383         os.clear();
00384         os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket bind failed for port: " << port;
00385         log(LOG_LOW,os.str());
00386         freeaddrinfo(result);
00387         shutdown(ListenSocket,2);
00388 #ifdef WINDOWS
00389                 closesocket(ListenSocket);
00390 #else
00391                 close(ListenSocket);
00392 #endif
00393         return 0;
00394     }
00395     iResult = listen(ListenSocket, SOMAXCONN);
00396     if (iResult == SOCKET_ERROR)
00397     {
00398         os.str("");
00399         os.clear();
00400         os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID:MAIN socket listen failed for port: " << port;
00401         log(LOG_LOW,os.str());
00402         shutdown(ListenSocket,2);
00403 #ifdef WINDOWS
00404                 closesocket(ListenSocket);
00405 #else
00406                 close(ListenSocket);
00407 #endif
00408         return 0;
00409     }
00410         fwork->setblocking(ListenSocket);
00411     freeaddrinfo(result);
00412         return(ListenSocket);
00413 }

00416 string generic_plugin::generic_plugin_version()
00417 {
00418     return("0_0_0_9");
00419 }
00420 /*****************************************************************************************************/
00421 
00422 int generic_plugin::get_plugin_params(string line)
00423 {
00424     generic_server *fwork = (generic_server *) pinstance;
00425 
00426     if(line.size() > 11 && line.compare(0,11,"NETWORKING=") == 0)
00427     {
00428         networking = atoi(line.substr(11).c_str());
00429         return(0);
00430     }
00431     if(line.size() > 14 && line.compare(0,14,"VERBOSE_LEVEL=") == 0)
00432     {
00433         verbose_level = atoi(line.substr(14).c_str());
00434         return(0);
00435     }
00436         if (line.size() > 16 && line.compare(0,16,"VALIDATE_PLUGIN=") == 0)
00437     {
00438                 if(atoi(line.substr(16).c_str()) )
00439                         validate_plugin = true;
00440                 else
00441                         validate_plugin = false;
00442         return(0);
00443     }
00444         return(1);
00445 }

00447 
00448 GEN_PLUGIN_MUTEX generic_plugin::create_mutex(void)
00449 {
00450         GEN_PLUGIN_MUTEX mutex;
00451 #ifdef WINDOWS
00452         mutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, NULL);
00453 #else
00454         pthread_mutex_init(&mutex,NULL);
00455 #endif
00456         return(mutex);
00457 }
00458 /*****************************************************************************************************/
00459 
00460 int generic_plugin::lock_mutex(GEN_PLUGIN_MUTEX *mutex)
00461 {// not using pthread_cond variable, since Windows does not support cond. variables
00462 #ifdef WINDOWS
00463 DWORD dwWaitResult;
00464     dwWaitResult = WaitForSingleObject(*mutex,INFINITE);
00465 #else
00466         pthread_mutex_lock(mutex);
00467 #endif
00468     return(1);
00469 }
00470 /*****************************************************************************************************/
00471 
00472 int  generic_plugin::rel_mutex(GEN_PLUGIN_MUTEX *mutex)
00473 {
00474 #ifdef WINDOWS
00475     ReleaseMutex(mutex);
00476 #else
00477         pthread_mutex_unlock(mutex);
00478 #endif
00479     return(1);
00480 }
